title: User Account - Employee Termination
description: A client submits an urgent request to offboard a terminated employee, disabling all access immediately.

tasks.description: Log a new ticket using the 'Employee Termination' template.
tasks.expected_outcome: An offboarding ticket with a checklist is created.

tasks.description: Immediately disable the user's Active Directory account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user's primary account is disabled, cutting off access to most systems.

tasks.description: Sign the user out of all Microsoft 365 sessions and convert their mailbox to a shared mailbox.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user's email access is cut off, and their data is preserved for the company.

tasks.description: Wipe the user's company-issued mobile device via the MDM tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: All company data is removed from the user's mobile phone.
